title: Sales IT Executive
company_description:
NOOSC initially started as Managed Security Services Provider. As the first of MSSP in Indonesia, we have gained much experience in MSSP and Security Operations Centre (SOC) market and after 3+ years working closely with Banking, Telecommunication, Insurance and Government institution, we found that MSSP or SOC alone does not fill in the gap in our client business space.

In 2018 we start our transformation journey from classic MSSP to Operations Analytics Services Provider. There are so much information/data within your server, networks (your log files is your treasures) - not only information about the systems but also data about your business transaction but lack of understanding and exploitation, because to reveal the treasure underneath require tedious work, dedicated human resources and the right technology. So here's the gap that we are filling.

As we came from infosec background, we will be continuing to strengthen our core competencies in Information Protection and Cyber Defence business, but now we are adding additional layer of providing IT operations compliance services (e.g. High Privilege user access review, Data Centre/DRC access review, regular vulnerability assessment) plus we are now start partnering with the various Operations Intelligence technology platform company to provide solutions and services in order to gain better visibility of your operations - not only IT but also your business operations (e.g. business transaction monitoring).

We are a strong believer that protecting the information security of our customers is our key contribution in making the world a safer place for global growth. However, we wanted to contribute further, by helping organisation better responding to their business dynamics in near or realtime manner.

We are the eyes and ears for your operations!
about_the_job:
AM

title: Marketing and Business Development Manager
company_description:
We are a Global Trade Association that brings together the entire advertising & marketing ecosystem of brands, marketers, agencies, media, publishers, technology enablers, telecommunication companies, etc to work collaboratively and help #ShapeTheFuture of Modern Marketing.
Country Head & Board of Director Indonesia : Ms @Shanti Tolani
APAC Managing Director : Mr. Rohit Dadwal
Chairperson MMA Indonesia : Mrs Ira Noviarti
about_the_job:
Here are the Roles & Responsibilities:

Membership Growth & Engagement:
Develop and implement strategies to increase membership, ensuring ongoing industry relevance.
Foster engagement with existing members through personalized communication and tailored initiatives.
Encourage and coordinate member participation in MMA initiatives.
Create and execute strategies to enhance membership, ensuring continuous industry relevance.
Increase membership among local Indonesian brands and marketers.
Target & KPI will be discussed during interview.

Marketing Strategy & Execution:
Formulate comprehensive marketing content plans for all MMA Indonesia initiatives.
Innovate and implement creative ideas to enhance audience engagement and brand visibility.
Manage and execute email campaigns, ensuring effective usage of MMA emailers and other communication channels.
Oversee the planning, execution, and analysis of social media strategies across platforms.
Connecting with third parties regarding content plan and relevance.

Event Planning & Management:
Develop detailed sponsorship packages and engaging presentations.
Coordinate with Program and Operations Manager to align sponsorship opportunities with the overall event strategy.
Manage third-party vendors, ensuring seamless coordination and execution of event logistics.
Create post-event reports, summarizing key metrics, feedback, and insights for internal and external stakeholders.

Communication & Networking:
Establish and maintain effective communication with event partners, sponsors, media, and attendees.
Facilitate networking opportunities for attendees, sponsors, and industry thought leaders during events.
Engage with past event partners and participants to gather content for promotional material.

Budget Planning & Reporting:
Develop detailed budgets for marketing initiatives and events.
Create comprehensive cost and income reports, providing insights into financial performance.
Monitor expenditures to ensure adherence to budgetary constraints.

Requirements:
More than 10 years of experience in Business Development & Marketing.
Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English & Indonesian.
Proven experience in proposal development, marketing strategies, and event management.
Strong decision-making, project management, and multitasking skills.
Metrics-driven mindset with creativity; basic design skills preferred (Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, etc.).
Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools.
Proficiency in online marketing and social media strategy.
Established contacts in the industry.
Design skills for visuals and videos is a plus.

title: Site Reliability Engineer Lead
company_description: Dropsuite is a cloud software platform enabling businesses and organizations globally to easily backup, recover and protect their important business information. Dropsuite’s commitment to advanced, secure, and scalable cloud technologies keeps us at the forefront of the industry and makes us the choice of leading IT Administrators and Service Providers globally.
about_the_job:
About Dropsuite 
Dropsuite (listed DSE:ASX) safeguards business information. We are a global, fast-growing, partner-centric company building secure, scalable, and highly usable cloud backup technologies for businesses. Our mission is to help businesses stay in business. Dropsuite performs billions of backups per day for organizations in more than 100 countries around the globe. 

Dropsuite is known for its team of ‘hungry owners.’ We are hungry to win and tenacious, but at the same time we all are owners: we do not cut corners and always seek to do the right thing. We are experts in what we do, are highly customer focused and we love solving problems. We play as a team, where respect is one of our key values and we see helping others as a priority. 

About the Role 
As an SRE Lead, you will be responsible for leading a team of Site Reliability Engineers in designing, implementing, and maintaining highly scalable and reliable systems. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software engineers and system administrators, to ensure the seamless operation of critical production services. 

What will you be doing 
Team Leadership:  
Lead, mentor, and guide a team of Site Reliability Engineers. 
Foster a collaborative and innovative team culture. 
Provide technical guidance and support for team members across all activities of the SiteOps team 
Be accountable for the work outcomes of the SRE team including production uptime and optimization projects 
Own Operational projects and Network Operations Centre (NOC). Implement SOP for the NOC to derive maximum coverage. 
System Architecture and Design: 
Collaborate with software engineering teams to design and implement scalable and reliable systems. 
Participate in system architecture discussions and provide input to ensure best practices are followed. 
Participate in code reviews to ensure adherence to DevOps / SRE best practices. 
Work closely with system administrators, network engineers, and security teams to ensure a holistic approach to system reliability. 
Manage and version control infrastructure configurations. 
Automation and Tooling: 
Develop and maintain automation scripts and tools to streamline operational tasks. 
Develop and maintain automation tools for infrastructure provisioning, configuration management, and deployment (Terraform or Ansible) 
Implement monitoring and alerting solutions to proactively identify and address potential issues. 
Evaluate, implement, and manage DevOps / SRE -related tools for configuration management, monitoring, and logging. 
Incident Management: 
Lead incident response efforts, ensuring timely resolution of production issues. 
Conduct post-incident reviews and implement improvements to prevent future incidents. 
Performance Optimization: 
Analyse system performance and implement optimizations to enhance reliability and efficiency. 
Work on capacity planning to accommodate future growth. 
Security and Compliance: 
Work with security teams to implement and enhance security measures in the DevOps pipeline. 
Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements. 
Ensure adherence to established security standards across all environments both with the engineering and the SiteOps teams 
Documentation: 
Maintain and update documentation related to system architecture, processes, and best practices. 
On-call Support: 
Participate in an on-call rotation schedule to provide 24/7 support for production systems. 

Our ideal candidate has 
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field. 
Proven experience as a Site Reliability Engineer / DevOps leader or in a similar role. 
In-depth knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP). 
Strong leadership and communication skills. 
Proficiency in programming/scripting languages (e.g., Python, Shell, Ruby). 
Proficiency in System administration of production servers 
Experience with container orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker). 
Familiarity with infrastructure as code (e.g., Terraform, Ansible). 
Expertise in Build and release strategies and able to implement the right strategy for the team 
Expertise in monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Datadog, Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, etc). 
Solid understanding of networking concepts and protocols. 
Understanding of security best practices in DevOps processes. 
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills. 
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment. 

What we offer 
Competitive compensation 
Long term incentives (e.g., Stock options or performance rights – subject to performance) 
Health insurance 
Social Security (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan) 
Hybrid working model 
12 Days of Annual Leave 
Growth opportunities 
Work in a global company with meaningful work, highly skilled colleagues and an amazing culture 

If the above excites you and you are the person we are looking for; please submit your CV, your availability and desired salary. We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. 

Posting Statement 
Dropsuite is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. 

Please note that only applicants residing and eligible to work in Bandung Indonesia will be considered.

title: Business Development Staff (P2P Lending)

about_the_job:
About The Job

As our Business Development Staff, you’ll be instrumental in sales in the team that directly impacts the company by managing strategic partnerships, identifying key business opportunities and managing internal stakeholders.

Responsibilities

Identify and build strategic partnerships with financial institutions, businesses, and other key players in the financial services industry to enhance the reach and impact of our platform.
Develop and execute strategies to acquire new borrowers and investors, utilizing various channels such as digital marketing, events, and networking.
Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, ensuring their satisfaction and addressing any concerns or issues promptly.
Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new opportunities and potential areas for improvement.
Meet and exceed sales targets, driving revenue growth for the company through effective lead generation and conversion strategies.
Work closely with cross-functional teams including marketing, product development, and customer support to ensure a seamless end-to-end user experience.

Qualifications

A Bachelor's Degree in business, economics, finance, marketing, or a related field
At least 3 years of experience in business development, sales, marketing, or related field
Creative thinking skills. Whether it is seeing new ways of how existing opportunities could be developed or finding entirely new routes to market, creative thinking is essential for the role
Ability to address what will be the success metrics of the potential business opportunity
Ability to generate business model/scheme for commercial evaluation by using Excel/Google Sheet
Ability to create a straightforward presentation by using Powerpoint/Google Slide
Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills
Excellent organizational skills

title: RECRUITMENT MANAGER (JAWA TIMUR)
company_description:
Sunrecruit Indonesia is a boutique search consulting firm headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. Established since July 2014, we offer invaluable, excellence, and cutting-edge strategies for conducting high-level executive searches and recruitment services, as well as HR Consulting services.
Managed by dedicated and professional team with more than 10 years experiences working in multinational Executive Search firm, who have placed more than two hundred of candidates for various industries to local and multinational company clients,

Our specialization
A recruitment solutions to hire a high caliber candidate(s), i.e. Directors, General Managers, Senior Managers, and Middle Managers.

Industries Served :
• Automotive,
Five-years experience filling positions across Asia, America, and Europe, with German, American, Japanese, and Indian automotive company both 2 wheeler and 4 wheeler ATPM Company in Indonesia, brought us a large database of candidatesand also a profound understanding of the industry and its requirements. Areas of expertise include: manufacturing, sales and marketing, accounting and finance, dealer-network management,legal, compliance, human resources,and information technology.
• Financial Service
We have considerable experience working with banks, insurance companies and credit institutes. Positions include: underwriters, claims adjustors, chartered accountants, cost accountants, finance, controllers, auditors , CUO, CMO and CFOs.
• Manufacturing
Positions include: designers, director of human resources, engineerings and production, factory managers,plant managers, project managers, QCs, researchers, and other critical manufacturing positions.
• FMCG and Retail
Type of organizations: food and beverage, fashion and apparel industries, pharmaceutical industries, and some retail firms (retailer).
• Trading , Distribution, Shipping and Logistics and Property Developer
about_the_job:

Join our impact mission! Check our career page now👉🏼 https://careers.amartha.com/

Have strong leadership and excellent integrity

title: Business Development Consultant - Recruitment
company_description:
Michael Page, Page Personnel, Page Executive and Page Outsourcing are all part of PageGroup.

At the heart of our business are the thousands of people’s lives we change, the outstanding service we provide to our clients and candidates and the exciting opportunities within our offices all over the world. We’re proud to set the standard in the recruitment profession – our specialist service with a personal touch is how we change lives for people through creating opportunity to reach potential.

As an employer looking to hire, or a candidate aiming to grow your career, we will offer you a team that understands your market, backed by the resources and expertise of a global network.

PageGroup was established in the UK in 1976. We’re now a FTSE 250 organisation with operations in 37 countries, providing recruitment services and career opportunities at a local, regional and global level.

Our values are reflected in everything we do, every day, all over the world. They’re an integral part of our business and help set us apart from our competitors. They form a platform for our methods, approach to business and motivation of our people. More than just words, we believe our values are the essence of our brand and they influence the way we work day in, day out.

Earn trust
Grow connections
Make a difference
about_the_job:
Leaders in the Recruitment Industry|Work in an international and diverse setting

About Our Client

Michael Page is the world's most respected professional recruitment consultancy. Ranked by Forbes as one of the top global professional services, and in 2017, we are recognized by LinkedIn as the Most Socially Engaged Recruitment Company.

For 40 years our strategy has remained constant: organic growth centered around a team-based culture, a meritocracy that champions profit share and promotion from within. Our strategy is focused on delivering the highest level of professional service to our clients and candidates alike, always with an eye for the long term. Our business is expanding rapidly around the world and Asia is a major part of our success story - we are the market leader in China and across SE Asia & India we now have 300 consultants and will be launching in new countries soon!

Job Description

Responsible over particular market segment, with the challenge of strengthening existing relationships and winning new business
Act as a specialist consultant, which entails identifying market landscape, business development, and securing partnership in a competitive environment
Advising clients to add value to the recruitment and talent development process
Provide career coaching to help job seekers find their next role and offer expert advice to clients on topics such as market conditions, trends, and salary levels
Networking to build business information that can be converted into commercial opportunities

The Successful Applicant

Minimum Bachelor's Degree from top tier universities
Overseas academic or working experience is highly preferred
Working experience of 1-3 years is welcomed. Preferably in Construction Industry as Sales/BD role or having passion for commercial role
Self-motivated, driven, and a willingness to always keep learning
Strong communication skills in Bahasa and English

What's on Offer

Strong career progression opportunities
World-class training and development
A generous base salary with the opportunity for excellent bonuses
Global career opportunities
A dynamic and competitive work environment
Exposure to the world's biggest multinational brands and industry leaders
The opportunity to develop and lead a business unit

Contact: Antonius Trianto

Quote job ref: JN-082022-5707936

company_description:
Established in 1982 and listed on Indonesia Stocks Exchange (IDX) since 1989, PT Pakuwon Jati Tbk is a diversified real estate developer focused in Jakarta, Surabaya, Solo, Yogyakarta, Bali, Bekasi & Batam. The Company's portfolio of prime properties includes retail, residential, commercial and hospitality developments. PT Pakuwon Jati is vertically integrated across the full real estate value chain from land acquisition, property development, marketing and operational management.

PT Pakuwon Jati Tbk is the pioneer of the Superblocks concept in Indonesia, a large-scale integrated mixed-use development of retail shopping malls, offices, condominiums, and hotels. Its successful track record and reputation within the property industry have secured a strong long-term relationship with tenants and buyers, which provides a stable platform for rapid business expansion.

title: Brand Partnership & KOL Specialist
company_description:
PT Maha Nagari Nusantara dikenal sejak tahun 2015 sebagai brand lokal yang bermula di Bandung. Brand yang fokus pada produk tas untuk menemani aktivitas sehari-hari. Selalu berinovasi dengan produk-produk fungsional namun tidak menghilangkan bentuk tas yang simpel karena hidup yang aktif membutuhkan ruang gerak yang inovatif dan kreatif.

Tas seperti apa yang kamu butuhkan? Biar kami yang siapkan untuk kamu.
about_the_job:
Responsibilities

Job Overview:

We are looking for a Brand Partnership & KOL Specialist to join our growing team! As a KOL Specialist, you will play a crucial role in building and managing relationships with influential individuals who have a significant following in the fashion and lifestyle space.

Job Role

Identify key opinion leaders, influencers, and personalities with a strong presence in the target market.
Develop and maintain relationships with KOLs to enhance brand visibility and credibility.
Devise collaboration strategies, negotiate and coordinate collaborations, and ensuring mutually beneficial partnerships.
Work with KOLs to create engaging and authentic content showcasing the brand and its products.
Plan and execute events or campaigns involving KOLs.
Track and analyze the performance of KOL collaborations to provide insights and recommendations for optimizing future partnerships.
Cultivate a community of brand advocates among KOLs who genuinely support and promote the brand.
Keep abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and changes in the influencer marketing landscape.

Requirements

Job Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Fashion Management, or a related field.
Min. 1 year of experience in influencer marketing, brand partnerships, or a similar role (experience within the fashion retail industry is a plus).
Strong networking skills with the ability to identify and connect with relevant influencers in the fashion industry.
In-depth understanding of fashion industry trends and influencer marketing dynamics, familiarity with social media platforms and their role in brand promotion.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, ability to negotiate effectively and maintain positive relationships.
Creative thinking with the ability to develop innovative collaboration concepts.
Strong organizational and project management skills.
Proficient in analyzing data and metrics to evaluate the success of KOL collaborations.

about_the_job:
Chance to grow market access of notable multinational pharmaceutical company |Exciting career advancement opportunity 


About Our Client

Our Client is an established multinational pharmaceutical company, with global presence in various continents. They have strong R&D and focus their strategies in their breakthrough products in pipeline. They are eager to open access in Indonesia for these novel drugs, and looking for Market Access Manager to carry out this mission.

Job Description

Be in the front line with institutions and healthcare system stakeholders (e.g. local administrations, payers, decision-makers).
Address challenges from evolving macro environment in order to provide a strategic platform to BUs
Integrate market access thinking into brand plans enterprise-wide and upskilling the organization to be competent with market access principles.
Provide input and align with local stakeholders for the development of clinical and economic value propositions for each of the proposed products and solutions. Advise senior management on implications of national reimbursement or legislative changes that affect adoption or coverage.
Provide strategic market access and pricing solutions to key brand teams in line with brand strategy,
submitting Health Technology Assessments (HTAs) that demonstrates the product value proposition through health economic models, value dossiers and budget impact models etc.
Explore and assess different customers (ie. insurance, PAP) for innovative access solutions


The Successful Applicant

Minimum 7 years of experience in pharmaceutical marketing, in SPM or GPM role or above
Strong knowledge of country's healthcare system, pharmaceutical market environment and market access landscape including HTA decision making
Strong business acumen and analytical skills
Outstanding consultative and networking capabilities. Ability to expertly negotiate in tough situations with both internal and external groups and stakeholders.
Proven knowledge of payer decision-making, coverage, patient support program, and payment for medicine for both private and public payers

What's on Offer

Chance to grow market access of notable multinational pharmaceutical company
Exciting career advancement opportunity
Competitive benefit package


Contact: Virna Setjiadi

Individual Contributor |Well Known Company 


About Our Client

Our client is a well known Water Treatment Chemical company.

Job Description

Work with National Sales Manager (NSM) to develop annual Sales Target (Sales Volume & Sales Margin- NT & CM) based on analysis of historical sales data, market trends, customer's capability, etc.
Work with NSM to develop Business Objectives to ensure year on year growth.
Ensure achievement of Sales Target (Sales Volume & Sales Margin- NT & CM).
Execute Business Objectives as agreed for respective region (EX-JABODETABEK - Sumatra, Kalimantan, some parts of Java, etc). 
Promote sales of the new and/or targeted products, continuously identify opportunities to enter the new market and acquire new customers
Propose and execute any required marketing programs by collaborating with Marketing & Product Management Team (exhibitions, advertising, promotional event) in respective region.
Develop and maintain strong working relationships with all customers.
Collect & update important market information from industry (market price & situation, competition) on regular basis, propose any action plan if needed.
Propose timely competitive price based on customer tier, MMA & freight updated price information to maximize volume and profits for Astari.
Negotiate price with customers (if needed) to compete with competitors, propose to NSM / National Sales & Distribution Director according to each authority.
Propose rebates program for selected distributors as necessary. Track monthly & quarterly achievements of volume sales against rebate scheme.
Follow up for invoice payment to customers as per data from Credit Control to avoid overdue account receivable.
Provide 6 month rolling forecasts on monthly basis.
Propose Make to Stock (MTS) item for selected customer to ensure availability of products that are regularly sold and continuously monitor the inventory level to avoid any aging inventory.
Facilitate & verify complaints & claims from customers according to company process and procedure.


The Successful Applicant

Experience in sales and distribution outside of Jabodetabek
Industrial / building materials products (high quality industrial products/material)
Wide range of product portfolio (in terms of product types and/or SKUs, +/- 100 SKUs)
Experience in managing distributors / resellers of Industrial products
Strong command of Bahasa Indonesia
Minimum 7 years working experience with roles in Sales and min 3 years in managerial level
Strong networking with various level people (Business owner, Director, Manager and operational team)
Working independently with remote & minimal supervision
Regular and frequent Business Travel are required
Values : Agile, Sustainable, Transparent, Accountable, Resilience & Improve Continuously
Based in Serpong when not traveling

 Competitive Salary
 Company Car

 Sales Incentives
